titleStmt.title: Plutarch's morals. Part 2. translated from the Greek by several hands.
Moralia. English. 1691
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.
Midgley, Robert, 1655?-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Sawbridge, M. Gilliflower, R. Bently, [and seven others],

notesStmt.note: First translated by M. Morgan, S. Ford, W. Dillingham, T. Hay, and others with a pref. and dedication by M. Morgan; this ed. translated by Robert Midgley and others.
Volume I appears at reel 1428:15, volume II at reel 1709:7, volume III at reel 847:1, volume IV at reel 221:23, and volume V at reel 287:3.
Reproduction of originals in the British Library, Harvard University Library and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
